name: microsoft/orca-math-word-problems-200k
description: The microsoft/orca-math-word-problems-200k dataset is a significant contribution to the field of grade school math education. This dataset, generated using Azure GPT4-Turbo, contains approximately 200,000 math word problems designed to challenge and engage students at various levels. The dataset is a valuable resource for researchers, educators, and developers, offering a unique opportunity to explore the potential of large language models in enhancing math education. For more information, refer to the paper "Orca-Math: Unlocking the potential of SLMs in Grade School Math.
citeAs: @misc{mitra2024orcamath,       title={Orca-Math: Unlocking the potential of SLMs in Grade School Math},        author={Arindam Mitra and Hamed Khanpour and Corby Rosset and Ahmed Awadallah},       year={2024},       eprint={2402.14830},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL} }
creator: microsoft
keywords: Grade School Math Word Problems, Azure GPT4-Turbo, Orca-Math
